component.text:
Class A (1 – 126)
# of possible networks: 126
# of Hosts/Net: 16,777,214
Max. # Hosts: 16,777,214

Class B (128 – 191)
# of possible networks: 16,384
# of Hosts/Net: 65,534
Max. # Hosts: 1,073,709,056

Class C (192 – 223)
# of possible networks: 2,097,152
# of Hosts/Net: 254
Max. # Hosts: 532,676,608
CIDR allows customers to receive allocation of network address space based on actual requirements, not on predefined blocks based on address class.
